contentencoded:
This week, we're exploring how you've tried to make money our of your passion. Whether the arts, music, theatre, basket-weaving, how'd it go? How much support did you get?

Chris Guillebeau, the author of 'The Happiness of Pursuit' joins Lizzie O'Leary to talk about your pursuits.

 And maybe how to make a transition in your life.

 Send us an email, or reach us on Twitter, @MarketplaceWKND
title: Your Wallet: Profiting on passion
description: How do you make money off your passion?
